description: Give egg fried rice a green twist with shredded brussels sprouts and ingredients you probably have on hand already.
keywords: Fried rice,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Peanut free
name: Brussels Sprout Egg Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the beaten eggs for 1 minute, stirring all the time to scramble. Tip on to a plate and set aside.

Heat the rest of the oil and cook the spring onions and brussels sprouts for 3-4 minutes, until the sprouts are tender. Stir in the garlic and ginger paste, chilli paste and coriander stalks and cook for 1 minute.
Tip the rice into the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes to heat through. Stir in the eggs and fresh coriander and serve immediately with lime wedges.
